flavor: "I'm Rhino, I knock things down. That's what I do. That's who I am."
name: Rhino

flavor: "Out of my way!"
name: Rhino
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Breakin' & Takin' side scheme and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

flavor: "You brought this on yourself!"
name: Rhino
text: Toughness. (This character enter play with a tough status card.) When Revealed: Stun each hero.

flavor: Rhino is trying to smash through the facility wall and steal a shipment of vibranium. You must stop him!
name: The Break-In!
text: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
back_text: Contents: Rhino (I) and Rhino (II). (Rhino (II) and Rhino (III) instead for expert mode.) Rhino and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Bomb Scare). Setup: Advance to stage 1B.
back_flavor: Rhino is attacking a S.H.I.E.L.D. facility!

name: Armored Rhino Suit
text: Attach to Rhino. Forced Interrupt: When any amount of damage would be dealt to Rhino, place it here instead. Then, if there is at least 5 damage here, discard Armored Rhino Suit.

name: Charge
text: Attach to Rhino.
attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Rhino attacks, the attack gains overkill. (Excess damage to any ally from this attack is dealt to that ally's controller.) At the end of this attack, discard Charge.

name: Enhanced Ivory Horn
text: Attach to Rhino. Hero Action: Spend [physical] [physical] [physical] resources → discard this card

flavor: "What is Hydra doing here?" -- Carol Danvers
name: Hydra Mercenary
text: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.)

flavor: "I just wanna get paid!"
name: Sandman
text: Toughness. (This character enters play with a tough status card.)

flavor: "I bet you're shocked to see me!"
name: Shocker
text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each hero.

flavor: "You think you can stop me? What a joke!" -- Rhino
name: Hard to Keep Down
text: When Revealed: Rhino heals 4 damage. If no damage was healed this way, this card gains surge.

flavor: "Bring it!" -- Rhino
name: "I'm Tough"
text: When Revealed: Give Rhino a tough status card. If Rhino already has a tough status card, this card gains surge.

name: Stampede
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): This card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): Rhino attacks you. If a character is damaged by this attack, that character is stunned.

flavor: Rhino is breaking things and taking them!
name: Breakin' & Takin'
text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here. (Hazard Icon: Deal +1 encounter card during the villain phase.)

flavor: Panicked civilians crowd the area. It is difficult to confront Rhino without putting them at risk. Get the people to safety!
name: Crowd Control
text: (Crisis Icon: While this scheme is in play, you cannot remove threat from the main scheme.)

flavor: Reports are out that Hydra agents have planted a bomb in a nearby hotel.
name: Bomb Scare
text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here. (Acceleration Icon: Place +1 threat on the main scheme at the start of the villain phase.)

flavor: "I know that if you cut off one head, two more will take its place. But what if it blows up instead!" -- She-Hulk
name: Hydra Bomber
text: When Revealed: Choose to either take 2 damage or place 1 threat on the main scheme.

name: Explosion
text: When Revealed: If Bomb Scare is in play, assign X damage among heroes and allies, where X is the amount of threat on Bomb Scare. If Bomb Scare is not in play, this card gains surge.

flavor: "Nothing to see here people!" -- Iron Man
name: False Alarm
text: When Revealed: You are confused. If you are already confused, this card gains surge.

flavor: "Come meet your doom!"
name: Klaw
attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Klaw attacks, give him 1 additional boost card for this activation.

name: Klaw
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for The "Immortal" Klaw and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck.
attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Klaw attacks, give him 1 additional boost card for this activation.

name: Klaw
text: Toughness. (This character enters play with a tough status card.)
attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Klaw attacks, give him 1 additional boost card for this activation.

flavor: Your investigation reveals that the criminal enterprise is operated by Klaw, an old rival of the Avengers!
name: Underground Distribution
text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player.
back_text: Contents: Klaw (I) and Klaw (II). (Klaw (II) and Klaw (III) instead for expert mode.) Klaw and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Masters of Evil) Setup: Search the encounter deck for the Defense Network side scheme and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck. Advance to stage 1B.
back_flavor: The attack on the S.H.I.E.L.D. facility has been linked to an underground weapons network.

flavor: Klaw is meeting with the Crimson Cowl. Klaw and the mysterious figure dart into the shadows when you confront them, and Klaw's minions move to cover their escape.
name: Secret Rendezvous
text: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
back_text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player. Advance to stage 2B
back_flavor: Klaw has found a buyer for his illegal weapons. It's up to you to stop the sale but the meeting is surrounded by Klaw's cronies.

name: Sonic Converter
text: Attach to Klaw. Hero Action: Spend [energy] [mental] [physical] resources → discard this card.
attack_text: Forced Response: After Klaw attacks and damages a character, stun that character.

name: Solid-Sound Body
text: Attach to Klaw. Klaw gains retaliate 1. (After this character is attacked, deal 1 damage to the attacking character.) Hero Action: Spend [energy] [mental] [physical] resources → discard this card.

name: Armored Guard
text: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.) Toughness. (This character enters play with a tough status card.)

name: Weapons Runner
text: Surge. (After this card is revealed, reveal 1 additional encounter card.)
boost_text: Put Weapons Runner into play engaged with you.

name: Klaw's Vengeance
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard 1 card at random from your hand. When Revealed (Hero): Klaw attacks you. If this attack does damage, place 1 threat on the main scheme.

name: Sonic Boom
text: When Revealed: Either spend [energy] [mental] [physical] or exhaust each character you control.
boost_text: If this activation deals damage to you, exhaust your hero.

name: Sound Manipulation
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Klaw heals 4 damage. If no damage was healed this way, this card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): Take 2 damage. Klaw heals 2 damage.

flavor: Klaw's criminal enterprise is protected by a gang of hired thugs.
name: Defense Network
text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here.

flavor: Klaw is supplying villains with advanced weaponry from a clandestine arms facility.
name: Illegal Arms Factory
text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here.

flavor: Klaw's mastery of sound allows him to restore his solid form through sheer power of will.
name: The "Immortal" Klaw
text: Klaw gets +10 hit points. (When this scheme is defeated, Klaw loses those hit points.)

flavor: The Masters of Evil have arrived to attack the heroes!
name: The Masters of Evil
text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a [[Masters of Evil]] minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player.

name: Radioactive Man
attack_text: Forced Response: After Radioactive Man attacks you, discard 1 card at random from your hand.
boost_text: Discard 1 card at random from your hand.

name: Whirlwind
attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Whirlwind attacks you, also resolve his attack against each other hero.

name: Tiger Shark
attack_text: Forced Response: After Tiger Shark attacks, give him a tough status card.
boost_text: Give the villain a tough status card.

name: Melter
attack_text: The engaged player must defend against Melter's attacks with an ally they control, if able.

name: Masters of Mayhem
text: When Revealed: Each [[Masters of Evil]] minion attacks the hero it is engaged with. If no attacks were made this way, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Masters of Evil]] minion and put it into play engaged with you, the shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Ultron
attack_text: Forced Response: After Ultron attacks you, choose to either place 1 threat on the main scheme or put the top card of your deck into play facedown, engaged with you as a [[Drone]] minion.

name: Ultron
attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Ultron attacks you, put the top card of your deck into play facedown, engaged with you as a [[Drone]] minion. Until the end of his attack, Ultron gets +1 ATK for each [[Drone]] minion engaged with you.

name: Ultron
text: Each [[Drone]] minion gets +1 ATK and +1 hit point. Ultron cannot take damage while a [[Drone]] minion is in play. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Ultron's Imperative side scheme and reveal it. Then shuffle the encounter deck.

flavor: Ultron is using the components Klaw delivered in order to build an army of Ultron drones.
name: The Crimson Cowl
text: When Revealed: Each player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion.
back_text: Contents: Ultron (I) and Ultron (II). (Ultron (II) and Ultron (III) instead for expert mode.) Ultron and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Under Attack). Setup: Put the Ultron Drones environment into play. Shuffle the encounter deck. Advanced to stage 1B.
back_flavor: Klaw's mysterious, red-hooded employer is really the genocidal android Ultron.

flavor: If Ultron gains control of NORAD, he will have access to the United States' ballistic missile command!
name: Assault on NORAD
text: Forced Response: After placing threat here during step one of the villain phase, each player must choose to either place 2 threat here or put the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion.
back_text: When Revealed: Each player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion. Advance to stage 2B.
back_flavor: As you pursue Ultron, you receive a distress call from the North American Aerospace Defense Command in Colorado. They are besieged by an army of Ultron drones!

flavor: It's up to you to save the world from nuclear armageddon!
name: Countdown to Oblivion
text: Threat cannot be removed from this scheme. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game
back_text: When Revealed: Each player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion. Advance to stage 3B.
back_flavor: Ultron has seized control of NORAD. It's only a matter of time before he overcomes the command safeguards and launches the nuclear arsenal.

name: Ultron Drones
text: Each facedown [[Drone]] minion engaged with a player has a base SCH of 1, a base ATK of 1, and a base hit points of 1. Forced Response: After a facedown [[Drone]] minion is defeated, place that card in it's owners discard pile.

name: Program Transmitter
text: Attach to Ultron. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend [mental] [mental] resources → discard this card.
scheme_text: Forced Response: After Ultron schemes, place 1 threat on each side scheme.

name: Upgraded Drones
text: Attach to the Ultron Drones environment. Each facedown [[Drone]] minion gets +1 ATK and +1 hit point. Hero Action: Spend [energy] [mental] [physical] resources → discard this card.

name: Advanced Ultron Drone
text: Guard. Forced Interrupt: When Advanced Ultron Drone is defeated, the engaged player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion.

name: Android Efficiency
text: When Revealed: Each player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion.
boost_text: Choose to either spend a [energy] resource or put the top card of the deck into play facedown, engaged with you as a [[Drone]] minion.

name: Android Efficiency
text: When Revealed: Each player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion.
boost_text: Choose to either spend a [mental] resource or put the top card of the deck into play facedown, engaged with you as a [[Drone]] minion.

name: Android Efficiency
text: When Revealed: Each player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion.
boost_text: Choose to either spend a [physical] resource or put the top card of the deck into play facedown, engaged with you as a [[Drone]] minion.

name: Rage of Ultron
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Ultron schemes. Discard the top card of your deck for each threat placed this way. When Revealed (Hero): Ultron attacks you. Discard the top card of your deck for each damage dealt by this attack.

name: Repair Sequence
text: When Revealed: Ultron heals 2 damage for each [[Drone]] minion engaged with you. If no damage was healed this way, this card gains surge.
boost_text: Ultron heals 1 damage for each [[Drone]] minion engaged with you.

name: Swarm Attack
text: When Revealed: Each [[Drone]] minion engaged with your hero attacks. If no attack was made this way, put the top card of your deck into play facedown, engaged with you as a [[Drone]] minion.

name: Drone Factory
text: When Revealed: Each player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion. Place 1 threat here for each [[Drone]] minion in play.

flavor: Ultron is hacking wireless networks around the world to create a global crisis.
name: Invasive AI
text: When Revealed: Each player discards the top 3 cards of their deck.

flavor: Ultron directs his drone army through hive circuitry.
name: Ultron's Imperative
text: When Revealed: The first player puts the top 2 cards of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as [[Drone]] minions.

flavor: Civilians are under attack. They need your help fast!
name: Under Attack
text: When Revealed: Each player chooses to either place 2 threat here or deal 3 damage to their hero.

name: Vibranium Armor
text: Attach to the villain. Forced Response: After the villain take damage, give it a tough status card. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend [physical] [physical] resources → discard this card.

name: Concussion Blasters
text: Attach to the villain. The villain gains retaliate 1. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend [energy] [energy] resources → discard this card.

name: Concussive Blast
text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each friendly character.
boost_text: Deal 1 damage to each character you control.

name: Affairs of State
text: Give to the T'Challa player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust T'Challa → remove Affairs of State from the game. - Choose and discard a [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control. Discard this obligation.

flavor: The renegade, Killmonger, is leading a coup to seize control of Wakanda.
name: Usurp The Throne

flavor: "That should be me on the throne!"
name: Killmonger
text: Killmonger cannot take damage from [[Black Panther]] upgrades.

name: Heart-Shaped Herb
text: Surge (After this card resolves, reveal 1 additional encounter card) When Revealed: Give the villain and each minion engaged with you a tough status card.
boost_text: Give the villain a tough status card.

name: Ritual Combat
text: When Revealed: Discard the top card of the encounter deck. Then, choose to either deal X damage to your hero or place X threat on the main scheme. X is 1 more than the number of boost icons on the discarded encounter card.

name: Legal Work
text: Give to the Jennifer Walters player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Jennifer Walters → remove Legal Work from the game. - Give the main scheme 1 acceleration token. Discard this obligation.

flavor: Titania had held a grudge against She-Hulk for years. She won't rest until she settles the score.
name: Personal Challenge
text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here.

flavor: "Face it, Greenie. There's only room for one strongest woman... and it ain't you!"
name: Titania
text: X is equal to Titania's remaining hit points.

name: Genetically Enhanced
text:
Attach to the minion with the highest printed hit points. If there are no minions in play, this card gains surge.
Attached minion gets +3 hit points.

name: Titania's Fury
text: When Revealed: Titania attacks your hero. If Titania did not attack, heal all damage from Titania and this card gains surge.
boost_text: Give the villain 1 additional boost card for this activation.

name: Eviction Notice
text: Give to the Peter Parker player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Peter Parker → remove Eviction Notice from the game. - Discard 1 card at random from your hand. This card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

name: Highway Robbery
text: When Revealed: Each player places a random card from their hand facedown here. When Defeated: Return each facedown card here to its owner's hand.

flavor: "I'm faster, strong, and smarter than a hundred men my age!"
name: Vulture
text: Quickstrike. (After this minion engages your hero, it attacks.)

name: Sweeping Swoop
text: When Revealed: Stun your hero. If Vulture is in play, this card gains surge.
boost_text: If this activation deals damage to a friendly character, stun that character.

flavor: "Spider-Man will pay for interfering with my plans!" -- The Vulture
name: The Vulture's Plans
text: When Revealed: Discard 1 card at random from each player's hand. Place 1 threat on the main scheme for each different resource type discarded this way.

name: Business Problems
text: Give to the Tony Stark player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Tony Stark → remove Business Problems from the game. - Exhaust each upgrade you control. Discard this obligation.

flavor: Whiplash has seized control of a power plant, threatening to overload the transformers if his demands are not met.
name: Imminent Overload
text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here.

flavor: "You started this, Tony. I will finish it."
name: Whiplash
text: Retaliate 1 (After this character is attacked, deal 1 damage to the attacking character.)

name: Electric Whip Attack
text: When Revealed: Choose to either deal 1 damage to your hero for each upgrade you control or choose and discard an upgrade you control.
boost_text: If the villain is making an undefended attack, choose and discard an upgrade you control.

flavor: Five, four, three, two...
name: Electromagnetic Backlash
text: When Revealed: Each player discards the top 5 cards of their deck. For each printed [energy] resource a player discards this way, that player takes 1 damage.

name: Family Emergency
text: Give to the Carol Danvers player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Carol Danvers → remove Family Emergency from the game. - You are stunned. This card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

flavor: The Psych-Magnitron is a Kree device with the power to turn thoughts into reality. In the hands of Yon-Rogg, it would be a devastating weapon.
name: The Psych-Magnitron
text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here.

flavor: "It isn't real power unless they fear you"
name: Yon-Rogg
attack_text: <b>Forced Response/b>: After Yon-Rogg attacks, place 1 threat on The Psych-Magnitron.

name: Kree Manipulator
text: Surge. (After this card resolves, reveal 1 additional encounter card.) When Revealed: Place 1 threat on the main scheme.
boost_text: If the villain is making an undefended attack, place 1 threat on the main scheme.

flavor: "This world now belongs to the Kree empire!" -- Yon-Rogg
name: Yon-Rogg's Treason
text: When Revealed: Discard each [energy] resource from your hand. If you discarded no cards this way, this card gains surge.

name: Legions of Hydra
text: When Revealed: If Madame Hydra is not in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Madame Hydra and put her into play engaged with you, then shuffle the encounter deck. Place 2 additional threat here for each [[Hydra]] enemy in play.

name: Madame Hydra
text: Madame Hydra cannot take damage while the Legions of Hydra side scheme is in play.
attack_text: Forced Response: After Madame Hydra schemes or attacks, place 2 threat on the Legions of Hydra side scheme.
scheme_text: Forced Response: After Madame Hydra schemes or attacks, place 2 threat on the Legions of Hydra side scheme.

name: Hydra Soldier
text: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.) When Defeated: Deal the engaged player an encounter card.

name: The Doomsday Chair
text: When Revealed: If MODOK is not in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for MODOK and put him into play engaged with you, then shuffle the encounter deck.

flavor: "You should have stayed hidden under the rock you crawled out from!"
name: MODOK
text: Retaliate 2. (After this character is attacked, deal 2 damage to the attacking character.)

name: Biomechanical Upgrades
text: Surge. Attach to the minion with the highest printed hit points and without another Biomechanical Upgrades attachment. Forced Interrupt: When attached minion would be defeated, heal all damage from it instead, this discard this card.

flavor: "The world will be mine!" -- Red Skull
name: Advance
text: When Revealed: The villain schemes.

flavor: "Die!" -- Venom
name: Assault
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): This card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): The villain attacks you.

name: Caught Off Guard
text: When Revealed: Discard an upgrade or support you control. If no cards were discarded this way, this card gains surge.

name: Gang-Up
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): This card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): The villain and each minion engaged with you attacks you.

name: Shadow of the Past
text: When Revealed: Reveal your set-aside nemesis minion and put it into play engaged with you. Reveal your set-aside nemesis side scheme and put it into play. Shuffle the rest of your set-aside nemesis encounter set into the encounter deck. If your nemesis minion does not enter the game this way, this card gains surge.

name: Exhaustion
text: Surge. When Revealed: Exhaust your identity card.

name: Masterplan
text: When Revealed: Place 4 threat on each side scheme. If there are no side schemes in play, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a side scheme is discarded. Reveal that side scheme.

flavor: "But wait, there's more" --Klaw
name: Under Fire
text: Surge. When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck.
